ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
var book=解析.match(/book=(\{.*\});/)[1]
data=JSON.parse(book)
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: book_name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>html_b=src.match(/dstr="(.+)"/)[1];
//java.log(html_b)
var 解析=java.base64Decode(html_b,"utf-8")
var 解析=decodeURIComponent(解析)
var data=JSON.parse(解析)
JSON.stringify(data)
</js>
$.chapter_list[*]
